attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Not a great app. Extremely underwhelming and has tons of bugs.

attributes.title: Awful Experience
attributes.review: Wouldn’t recommend this app. It stained my skin orange and now I can’t stop thinking about fascism.

attributes.title: “The right view”🙄
attributes.review:
The puns are gross. 45 is gross. If you love trump you’re gross. 
BLACK LIVES MATTER
DEFUND THE POLICE
Put money back into schools, mental health, community programs. Stop donating your money to this campaign, he has plenty, you don’t. 

What are the rewards points for? What can you redeem them for? Pats on the back for simply being a maga lover? 🤮

attributes.title: Feet
attributes.review: When I opened the app all I could see were pictures flog trumps tiny dick and old man feet I’m so grossed out

attributes.title: Crap
attributes.review: I’ve tried and tried again to get it to work... but Trump’s app is just as useless as him. 💀

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I’m disappointed. This did not live up to my expectations. If this app had a physical form I would throw oranges at it and throw it into the ocean.
DONT DOWNLOD! Once you get the app, it shows you trumps micro peen! 🍤 it ruined Cheetos for me. And it ate my kids, I turned around and saw trump fingering my kids! This app truly ruined my life. 🌝

attributes.title: A dictator in the making
attributes.review: Only 3 people in history have tear gassed their own peaceful citizens: Adolf Hitler, Saddam Hussein, and Donald J Trump. Is this what he meant when he said “make America great again?”

attributes.title: Cheeto ads??
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it kept giving me ads for cheetos ? They need to make the motive for their campaign clear.
